description:
🛑Disclaimer: The web version can present some problems and not a high graphics quality fidelity, consider downloading the PC build instead. About

Project realized during between 14/01/2021 and 21/01/2021 for a job application test from a company called Oniria.

Oniria is a technology-based company that serves companies with training and professional engagement demands. Oniria solutions are based on the development of software, electronics, and hardware for Virtual Simulators, Serious Games and Gamification aimed at training and engaging office teams, sales teams and operational personnel.

🔗See this project on my Github!
